data.name: Elasticsearch
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setHeader name="ES_NAME">
        <constant>
            {{instance_name}}
        </constant>
    </setHeader>
    {{#if (eq query_params.operation "Search")}}
    <convertBodyTo type="String"/>
    {{/if}}
    <toD uri="${header.ES_NAME}://elasticsearch?indexName={{indexName}}&{{querystring query_params extra_query_params true}}"/>
    {{#if (eq postProcessHitsToString true)}}
        <process ref="elasticSearchHitsToString"/>
    {{/if}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
